Class MovingDoor

                    +--eecs.jago.element.MovingDoor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, java.lang.Runnable, Visible
public class MovingDoor
extends SolidElement

This class provides a large door that opens/closes when pushed. The current implementation only opens to the right, hinged from the top. Future versions will allow specification of the direction to open the door, and will also provide lockable doors that require a key.
